actions.name: Stakeout
actions.description: Effect: The user's attacks will have double Power against creatures who have switched in or newly joined combat before the end of the current round. This does not count for a creature that was switched in to replace a @Affliction[fainted] creature.

system.description: Effect: The user's attacks will have double Power against creatures who have switched in or newly joined combat before the end of the current round. This does not count for a creature that was switched in to replace a @Affliction[fainted] creature.
